title: [LFM] Top Laner to join semi fun, semi serious, team (Low Elo)
body:
NCX is looking for a top laner (B1-G1)

We're a team that wants to play some serious ranked teams games, (e.g not trolling) but we're doing it for fun, and we don't expect to climb very high within the ladder. (Hit Silver or something)

We want to be able to play a few ranked games a week, mostly on weekends.
We're looking for someone that is fun and awesome to be our top laner and mainly to enjoy playing some ranked games as a team.
Voice communication will be required, to apply, add NCX Murasame in game.
Taking the NCX tag is completely optional
